entry.summary: Support as you see fit. A new, similar site, www.ultrabizz.com is aimed at bigger projects, providing a built in contract...
entry.content: Support as you see fit. A new, similar site, www.ultrabizz.com is aimed at bigger projects, providing a built in contract system and a job requirements area.

entry.title: Mark Daniels commented on 'eLance Success'

link.title: Of course supporting the global economy. USA products are sold everywhere in the world, therefore world products should be sold...

entry.summary: Of course supporting the global economy. USA products are sold everywhere in the world, therefore world products should be sold...
entry.content:
Of course supporting the global economy. USA products are sold everywhere in the world, therefore world products should be sold in USA as well. This is what globalization is about.
We run a website similar to elance, called SupportUniverse. Cheaper prices and better after-sale service.
